contest-event.event-date:
May 13, 1995 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-first-section
Symphony of Marches
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - percussion Lewis Merthyr. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 8 bands competed
March 3, 2011, 1:16 p.m. July 1, 2020, 9:16 a.m.
1 Lewis Merthyr Band Dennis Mahoney
2 Rogerstone Band Laurence Harries
3 Tylorstown Band Ceri Thomas
4 Abergavenny Borough Band Eric Powell
5 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Tudor Williams
6 Markham and District Band C. Brian Buckley
7 TATA Brass E. J. Clark
8 Ebbw Vale Band D. T. Oakden
